title: Representation
context: ยง392-76 Representation. In any proceeding for judicial review pursuant to section 392-75, the director may be represented by the attorney general or by any qualified attorney who is employed by the department for that purpose in conformity with section 28-8.3. [L 1969, c 148, pt of ยง1; am L Sp 1993, c 8, ยง53; am L 2015, c 35, ยง38]
